About Us
THE JACKSONVILLE CARIBBEAN CARNIVAL, INVITES YOU TO JOIN OUR THREE-DAY STAYCATION IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA
The
Jacksonville Caribbean Carnival (JCC)
is an explosion of color, culture, and community that brings the vibrant spirit of the Caribbean to Jacksonville each year! Through our Parade, Festival, and Concert, we proudly showcase the rich heritage of the Caribbean right here in our city. Attracting thousands of passionate fans from across the globe, JCC is a spectacular celebration not to be missed.
Every fourth week of August, we invite you to take your vitamins and get ready for two unforgettable nights and two full days of festivity, music, and family fun—surrounded by old and new friends alike.
JCC promises an immersive experience that transports you straight to the islands, featuring live performances by local and international soca superstars such as Patrice Roberts, Skinny Fabulous, Nadia Batson, Pumpa, Adam O, and Shurwayne Winchester. Over the years, our stages have also welcomed legends like the Mighty Sparrow, Rupee, Super Blue, Farmer Nappy, Leon Coldero and Code 868, and Branches Steelband.
Our Carnival concert embraces the full spectrum of Caribbean music, hosting an exceptional lineup of Reggae, Hispanic, and Haitian artists. This diverse showcase draws festival lovers from all backgrounds who share in the rhythms, traditions, and joyful energy that define the Caribbean experience.
Come celebrate with us—and discover why the Jacksonville Caribbean Carnival is truly where the islands meet the First Coast!
THE JACKSONVILLE CARIBBEAN CARNIVAL, INVITES YOU TO JOIN OUR THREE-DAY STAYCATION IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA
The
Jacksonville Caribbean Carnival (JCC)
is an explosion of color, culture, and community that brings the vibrant spirit of the Caribbean to Jacksonville each year! Through our Parade, Festival, and Concert, we proudly showcase the rich heritage of the Caribbean right here in our city. Attracting thousands of passionate fans from across the globe, JCC is a spectacular celebration not to be missed.
Every fourth week of August, we invite you to take your vitamins and get ready for two unforgettable nights and two full days of festivity, music, and family fun—surrounded by old and new friends alike.
JCC promises an immersive experience that transports you straight to the islands, featuring live performances by local and international soca superstars such as Patrice Roberts, Skinny Fabulous, Nadia Batson, Pumpa, Adam O, and Shurwayne Winchester. Over the years, our stages have also welcomed legends like the Mighty Sparrow, Rupee, Super Blue, Farmer Nappy, Leon Coldero and Code 868, and Branches Steelband.
Our Carnival concert embraces the full spectrum of Caribbean music, hosting an exceptional lineup of Reggae, Hispanic, and Haitian artists. This diverse showcase draws festival lovers from all backgrounds who share in the rhythms, traditions, and joyful energy that define the Caribbean experience.
Come celebrate with us—and discover why the Jacksonville Caribbean Carnival is truly where the islands meet the First Coast!
Mission
Our Vision:
Igniting a legacy of Caribbean exploration through diversity and inclusion with our culture.
Mission Statement:
Jacksonville Caribbean Carnival stands as the conduit for diversity and inclusion within the community. Our culture, inclusive of our music, food and positive outlook on life, resonates as a respected voice in Jacksonville. We own our role in cross cultural relations by educating and sharing our culture with the community while uniting cultures. We use our voice celebrate the Caribbean, increase awareness of the Caribbean, share the love of Caribbean, be of service to the community and leave a legacy of the Caribbean to enjoy. Jacksonville Caribbean Carnival promotes growth, prosperity and carnival for all. We live to love, love to jump, and jump to [whine]!
